Title: Technical Game Designer II - Riftbound: The League of Legends Trading Card Game
RoleDescription:
As a Game Designer, you will design, tweak, and optimize the player experience. Your analytical skills, player insight, and creativity aid in crafting in- and out-of-game experiences that engage and surprise players. You will collaborate with interdisciplinary teams and work with every tool at hand to innovate and iterate player-focused designs that'll delight millions around the world.
As a Technical Game Designer II on Riftbound, you'll be working in open design spaces to help define the direction of an exciting new gaming experience. As a Technical Designer specializing in systems and gameplay, you will be responsible for implementing rich features that will delight players around the world and keep them engaged. Youll design and implement tools on Riftbound.  You will report to the Game Director.
Responsibilities:

Understand the relevant audiences for the game, and from this, calibrate your design expertise to reflect appropriate taste for these audiences
Use data and sense-making to identify opportunities to improve the health of the game through cards
Articulate and consider a scope and depth of possible solutions, including possible effects, and collaboratively reach the best solution
Discover solutions conceptually through rapid prototyping
Implement card content and iterate on it through playtesting
Create tools and improve pipelines that amplify the quality and velocity of your fellow designers
As needed, act as a tools engineer no more than 50% of the time (generally closer to 35%, with some weeks at 0% and occasional emergencies near 100%)
Be a bridge between designers and engineers, and an advocate for both solid implementation and high design velocity 

Required Qualifications:

2+ years of experience in professional game design, or equivalent experience
2+ years of experience in professional engineering or technical game design, or equivalent experience
Proficiency with Python
Experience designing and implementing systems in large, ambiguous spaces
Experience leading development on features in a rapid development environment 
Experience with balancing product goals with design decisions

Desired Qualifications:

Professional experience developing in unreal
Professional experience developing in C++ or other early-binding compiled languages
Experience with both gameplay and systems design
Experience working on TCGs or other PVP strategy card games
Experience mentoring other designers

For this role, you'll find success through craft expertise and a collaborative spirit that prioritizes the delight of players. We will look at your past studies and experience, but for this role, we also look for dedicated people with a personal relationship with games. If you embody player empathy and care about players' experiences, this is the role for you!

Title: Senior Manager, Accounting
RoleDescription:
Riot Games was established in 2006 by entrepreneurial gamers who believe that player-focused game development can result in great games. In 2009, Riot released its debut title League of Legends to critical and player acclaim. As the most played video game in the world, over 100 million play every month. Players form the foundation of our community and its for them that we continue to evolve and improve the League of Legends experience.
Were looking for humble but ambitious, razor-sharp professionals who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. Like us, you take play seriously; youre passionate about games. We embrace those who see things differently, arent afraid to experiment, and who have a healthy disregard for constraints.
That's where you come in.
As a Senior Manager of Accounting, you will oversee all accounting operations for Riots China businesses, ensuring full compliance with both US GAAP and PRC GAAP. Reporting to the Director of Accounting, you will collaborate with global and regional finance teams to ensure timely and accurate reporting, oversee statutory audits, and drive accounting operational excellence. This position blends strategic thinking with hands-on execution, requiring deep technical expertise, strong leadership, and the ability to build effective partnerships with key stakeholders.
Responsibilities:

Manage the financial accounting and reporting function for Riots China operations, including statutory filings and internal reporting
Ensure compliance with both US GAAP and PRC GAAP; work closely with global accounting to ensure alignment on policies and practices
Review journal entries, account reconciliations, and trend analysis for accounts such as revenue, prepaid expenses, fixed assets, accruals, accounts payable and other areas
Lead the monthly, quarterly, and annual close processes, ensuring completeness, accuracy, and timeliness of financial reporting
Develop, implement, and maintain robust internal controls and accounting policies
Review contracts and significant transactions to assess accounting implications and ensure appropriate treatment
Lead accounting transformation initiatives, including process improvements, system implementations, and the adoption of automation technologies or scalable software solutions
Serve as a trusted advisor to cross-functional teams including Legal, Finance, Tax, and Business Operations

Required Qualifications: 

Bachelors degree in Accounting or Finance
10+ years of progressive accounting experience including Big 4 public accounting and multinational corporate accounting in a leadership role
Strong understanding of both US GAAP and PRC GAAP
Hands-on experience managing accounting close, internal controls, and policy implementation
Proven ability to lead and grow a high-performing team
CPA or equivalent (US, PRC or international certification)
Bilingual in Mandarin and English

Desired Qualifications: 

Operational experience in technology, media, or gaming industries
Experience with ERP systems (Yonsuite and Oracle preferred)
Prior experience supporting global or regional accounting transformation projects

Dont forget to include a resume and cover letter. We receive a lot of applications, but well notice a fun, well-written intro that shows us you take play seriously.

Riot Games was established in 2006 by entrepreneurial gamers who believe that player-focused game development can result in great games. Influence level and 3D asset creation pipeline with your understanding of optimization to take into account efficiency and cross dependencies
Work with various materials from hand painted diffuse to PBR workflows
Proficient in lighting techniques and the aesthetics of light and shadow.

Communicate with various other disciplines to ensure all assets are performant
Help guide and mentor members of the team

Easily understand and clearly articulate the products distinctive visual style, while supporting and maintaining it
Consistently reflect and uphold company values in your work and interactions

Experience in asset design and production
Experience in level editing, including scene editing, materials, lighting, and performance optimization.
Familiarity with the League of Legends IP and its style

Title: UI Motion Graphics Artist - 2XKO
RoleDescription:
Established in 2020, the Singapore Studio is Riots second international game development studio. Riot has been expanding our footprint in Asia and accelerating our talent growth to develop games that deliver great experiences to our players. Our mission is to scale Riots games to hyper-serve players.
We partner with our LA headquarters on game development for League of Legends, Teamfight Tactics, and Legends of Runeterra. Were also building teams for VALORANT and 2XKO - our upcoming fighting game. The Singapore Studio is seeking talented, passionate craft experts with backgrounds in all areas of game development to build games that make it better to be a player. 
Were focused on working together to promote individual autonomy, ownership, collaboration, and inclusivity, so everyone can be their best while we boldly pursue games.
Thats where you come in.
Motion Graphics Artists concept and give life to Riot Games products. Your technical skills and keen aesthetic eye for motion and compositing will transform static images into interactive works of art.  You will make creative decisions that define how elements in 2XKO will interact, build, transition, and function in collaboration with artists, designers, and engineers around the world.
As a UI Motion Graphics Artist on 2XKO, you will design, lead, and execute 2XKOs full range of motion needs including: UI Animatics, full-motion user flows with interaction states, transitions, and more. You will collaborate with Visual Design, UX Design, Audio, Engineering, and QA to guarantee motion is used to add clarity and excitement to the game.
Youll report to the Manager of Game Production for the Singapore 2XKO team.
Responsibilities:

Create UI Animatics by taking the visuals of menus, buttons, navigation flows, and UI and animating them according to Riots and 2XKOs quality bar and style
Implement motion graphics with Unreal Engine 5, including documenting motion design conventions and best practices for future artists to leverage
Confidently operate as a subject matter expert on motion graphics for the team, able to effectively communicate and represent principles of animation and when motion is best used to better the players experience
Breathe life into the game experience by adding dynamic elements and animating visual effects from static artwork
Support a culture of continuous improvement, ownership, and collaboration

Required Qualifications:

3+ years of professional experience as a motion graphics artist
Strong Understanding of animation principles and how to use them effectively
Experience animating dynamic and functional User Interfaces, including systems, menus, and HUDs
Experience using Adobe Suite including After Effects with industry standard plugins, and collaborating with tools like Figma

Knowledge of the fighting game genre and its community
